content.detailedDescription:
Shortly after 3 am thursday may 8 2014 i decided to push the trash can to the curb for pick up. i am walking north as i do this.

my peripheral vision picks up light/movement in the sky to my left (west).

i see a blue glowing object (eliptical) with a fuzzy white outline.  this object is descending in an arc towards the northwest horizon.  it is at least half as large as the largest moon i've seen or it is more than 2 times the size of the moon i saw during the recent eclipse of the moon.  the object is silent.  i hear nothing.  the object takes about 3 to 4 seconds to make it's arc in the sky and disappears behind my horizon to the northwest.  the object had short trails from it's top and bottom from my perspective.

i was shocked when i first saw the object.  i had never seen anything like it before.  i felt uncomfortable because i didn't know what it was.  

now i think perhaps it was a bolide or space garbage.
content.summary: Took out trash saw light/movement in sky blue elipse w/fuzzy white borders

content.detailedDescription:
I was there with my friends, playing on the field. all of a sudden we notice like 8 floating lights high up above. they were blinking and sort of glowing. 
they were round.
content.summary: Like 8 floating lights

content.detailedDescription:
I saw flashing lights in the sky, photographed them and got this picture. crazy. it stood still 
in the sky for about 10 minutes and then i finished the cigarette and had to return to work. 
half the time i kept the camera pointed towards the sky, 
but later i realized that it does not have the shitty memory.
keep your eyes on the sky guys and you will see!
content.summary: Crazy

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife were staying at my father's house with our kids. around 1:30 am we hear our oldest daughter crying in my parents room. we were staying in the spare room off the basement which is directly under my parents room. when we went upstairs to check on her. my dad an step mom were still as asleep and told us the next day they didn't know she ws even crying. we got her out of the crib and she didn't want anything to do with me. she would not even let my wife put her down to go to the bathroom. i went outside on the porch to calm down because all of a sudden i startex to get really angry for no reason. about 5-10 minutes later my wife came outside with our daughter an we heard a strange humming sound. we started looking around an saw an object fly right above the trees in the front yard which are between 20 and 30 feet tall we tried to follow its path but it was gone. we looked up an saw it again only this time it was far up in the sky and met up with another object and they seemed to merge together and shot off and disappeared. about 2-3 minutes later we saw several jets fly over head. after that we went inside because my daughter had finally calmed down. after that for the next 2 days there were black helicopters flying over the area and there was a strange patch of hair on my back that had grown overnight.
content.summary: Woke up with my wife went outside and saw something strange in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
It was late in august of 1987, i believe it was about the 28th. i remember the moon was dark. i had specifically chosen the weekend to go camping and fishing because the moon was dark and i had read that fishing was better for walleye during the dark of the moon.
  i was camping alone, except for my border collie puppy who was only about 3 months old. my campsite was in the wanapum state park on the columbia river in washington state. as i said, i had read that walleye fishing was better at night so at about 11pm i launched my boat from the state park boat ramp. the park is located just a short distance south of the vantage bridge, interstate 90, which traverses the columbia river. 
 my plan was to fish beneath and close to the bridge as i had read also that this was a good spot for walleye. since i���d never fished for walleye, i was relying on only what i had read and could glean from the local folks in vantage.
  it was dark, but the lights of the little town of vantage and bridge lights gave me enough light to see. the current wasn���t very strong but enough that i had to anchor my little boat. i was anchored so that my boat was just north, maybe 100��� of the bridge. i baited up and put out my line. my puppy was curled up in the front of my boat in a makeshift bed i had made for her with some rags. the only sound i could hear was the cars on the bridge crossing overhead.
   i���d fished for about an hour, maybe hour and a half, when sarah, my puppy, suddenly woke up and sat up staring into the distance to the south. i had my back towards the south and turned around and at first saw nothing but the starlit sky. as i looked however i realized there was something odd about the sky. there seemed to be a wedged shape hole, for lack of a better word, moving very slowly northwards towards us. i turned and sat facing the direction of the wedge and realized it was actually some sort of craft. i could tell it was very large and as it grew closer it became apparent it was actually huge. the craft was totally black, no lights, and traveling very slowly in a northwards direction. sarah began to whimper so i picked her up and cuddled her in my arms. i was mesmerized to say the least.
  as the wedge approached i estimated it to be probably at least 300��� wide. it was triangular, very much like a flying wing but the trailing edge was straight across. not the boomerang shape of the flying wing. the craft seemed to be about 200 maybe 300 feet above the bridge but it was very difficult to tell looking straight up at it. as it glided over the top of the bridge i did notice a difference in the sound of the traffic crossing the bridge so it had to be fairly close i would suspect. the sound of the cars and trucks was obviously being reflected off the craft just enough to make it noticeable. as the craft passed directly over us there was not exactly a sound coming from it but rather a resonance. it was an extremely deep resonance and if i had to describe it, i would say it was similar to the sound of highly amplified speakers at a rock concert when the instruments aren���t playing. a deep resonance that was more felt than heard.
  the craft passed over us and continued northward up the river gorge until it went out of sight. as you can imagine, i was pretty upset. my puppy was shaking and it took me awhile to settle her down. fishing was over for the night.
 i pulled up anchor and headed back to the launch. because it was so dark, i was only using my little trolling motor and we traveled quite slow. i didn���t want to accidentally hit anything which might be floating in the river. about 30 minutes passed and we heard a more familiar noise coming from the south right up the gorge. 2 jets, obviously a-10 warthogs, were screaming northwards at about 200��� altitude. i���d seen plenty of warthogs and know there unmistakable sound and these two were not wasting any time. they passed over us and disappeared as fast as they got there. my feeling was that they were chasing the wedge. sarah peed all over herself and me and at that point i had just about had all i could take. i fired up the big motor, cuddled my little dog under my arm and made my way back to the park as fast as i could.
  i have never told this story to anyone. this is my first time ever saying anything about it. i don���t know if i believe in aliens from outer space or not, but i certainly believe in ufos. this thing i saw was definitely not something normal. no aircraft, military or commercial, then or now, looks or behaves like what i saw.
content.summary: Black triangle traveling very slowly

content.detailedDescription:
I was smoking a cigarette on my back porch and it was about 2am on may 7th.
i noticed the brightest thing in the sky was not the moon. as the moon was to my southeast and this was to my southwest by west. i have lived here for almost two years and have seen from one to 4 at a time what look like glowing orbs floating above sometimes through the treeline. the latest one moved back and forth and up and down in a small area, then slowly faded away to my eye. i continued recording 30 more seconds after it was gone hoping to see it again. after i uploaded it to my pc from my iphone i inverted the colors and changed the contrast and brightness a bit. in doing this i was able to still see the object after it faded. i cant actually tell if it moved as far as what appears in the video after it goes dark but it appears to shoot up into the sky at great speeds. i'm attaching the original video straight from the iphone. thanks
content.summary: Standing on back porch, saw bright light comparitive to moon size may have changed from teardrop to circle then faded.

content.detailedDescription: I routinely go outside with my camera in hand in the evenings around 8:45pm and again around 4:30am. whenever the sky is clear (with the exception of full moons) multiple star like objects appear. this has been occurring over a year with consistency. i have witnessed objects streak through the sky, giving the appearance of shooting stars with multiple colored tails (usually white, green, blue, or orange). normally after streaking across the sky within seconds or minutes an object will appear. most times objects do not streak down, but can be observed approaching from the distance from all cardinal directions. i say approaching because these objects now seem to be targeting me and my family. by targeting i mean specifically these objects, after first appearing, will usually make a second or third pass so that they will directly fly over my head regardless to where i change my position. objects have been seen at a variety of speeds ranging from extremely slow to unbelievably fast. objects also range in elevation from several hundred to several thousand feet high. i have witnessed these objects both brighten and dim its lights at will. i have witnessed these objects seemingly signal to me and to each other with single pulses of light occurring at a 3 second interval. i have witnessed these objects signal with light pulses of a 1-3-1 pattern. i have witnessed these objects both brighten and dim as they approach or pass each other. i have witnessed these objects perform what can best be described as "gridding patterns" like that used by military aircraft. i have seen these objects expel and repulse other objects and in one instance i literally felt the energy of these objects hit my person. normally after these objects appear they are followed by a heavy and substantial military aircraft presence,with the appearance of trying to track, but not engage these objects. i have been able to take numerous photos of these objects and from my observation they appear to have the ability to change shape at will. in my earnest opinion i believe that i live in some sort of hot spot or portal in which these objects are able to operate with consistency. i also fear that in some way these objects are tracking me. this is based upon the fact that i have witnessed these objects in multiple cities and, as i stated earlier, they often change their flight path so as to fly directly above my head. i have routinely been able to point these objects out to others who confirm my sighting and marvel that they are present. i pray that this report is taken seriously. the photos that i'm attaching do not even represent 1% of the photos that i have, nor do they represent the best photo evidence that i have. if i am contacted i will be more than willing to provide more detailed photos including some that seem to show an external propulsion system of some kind. whether this report is believed or not i know what i am seeing and having spent time in the civilian civil air patrol and in the u.S. navy i know that they are not routine aircraft (military or commercial). thank you.
content.summary: Multiple routine sightings occuring at specific time intervals: usually around 20:45hrs in the evening and again around 04:45hrs in the morning

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the marine field band stationed at parris island , s.C. 
in the evening the band was on it's way back to the base after participating
in a parade somewhere within a 60 mile radius of parris island. as we came around a curve we were suddenly in the town square and there were hundreds of people looking upwards. so as i looked up to see what they were looking at, i saw what i believed to be a ufo. i am wondering if you ever had a report of a ufo in this area in this time period and location.
it just hovered over the town but we did stay to see what happened later.
content.summary: Silver isosolese triangular craft hovering above small town

content.detailedDescription: When i was a young boy,  me and a friend were spending the night in my parents front yard.   we were talking,  looking at the stars,  and trying to find constellations when we noticed a satellite streaming across the sky.   soon then after,  we saw what at first looked like another satellite; however,  after approximately 5 seconds,  the object stopped,  and then began moving erratically.  it would go left,  then right,  it appeared to get bigger,  then smaller.   there was no sound,  keep in mind it was small enough to look like a satellite.   this activity went on from this object lasted for approximately 10-15 minutes,  then it shot away quickly to what i believe would have been the north.   neither my friend,  nor i as far as i know have ever spoke about this.   we were scared about what we saw,  so much so,  we decided to go sleep inside about 20 minutes after the object disappeared.
content.summary: At first like satellite but then flew erratically changing directions quickly and super fast

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
At about mid september 1999 my wife and i returned to santa, idaho from a 4 day trip to montana.  we had left our two daughters, aged 17 and 10 at the time, at home with a friend to watch over them.  when we arrived back home the first thing out of their mouths was that they had seen a ufo.  i was skeptical but listened to their story.  they had been sitting on the porch in front of our house in the evening with another friend, about a half-hour before dark, when they saw a massive triangular shaped object moving silently accross the sky, in the east, about 2 miles away.  they watched it for several minutes until it disappeared behind a mountain to the ne.  they said it was very large, appeared to have white lights around the edges, and made no sound.  they were so emphatic that i thought they must have seen something, but had no idea what it might have been.

about two years later i found out that two men i know had also seen the same object.  they were very reluctant to talk about it but opened up to me when i told them about my daughter's sighting.  the first, "rd" lives about 6 miles from my house to the east.  he saw a large silent triangle craft moving to the ne at a distance of 3 to 4 miles from his house.  he also said it was lighted on the edges.  the second, "rh" lives about 3 miles east of my house.  he said he was outside just before dark and he "felt" or heard a humming sound above him.  he looked up and saw a massive triangle flying less the 500 feet above his house headed in a ne direction.  it was dull black and frightened him bad enough that he ran to the house and got his sks rifle and almost shot at the object.  both these men are very trustworthy and not prone to story telling.  they don't talk about this event and didn't report it to anyone.  to this day my daughter's still recall the event.  i swear these statements to be true to the best of my knowledge.
content.summary: Large triangle seen by multiple witnesses.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in bed when i was put into a trance. it felt like i was having surgery. i was uploaded with some type of digital code.It was like bianary code except there were twos along with the ones and zero's. what happened to me and what is this code about? i also have three dots in a triangle pattern on my hand. and more on my inner thigh.
content.summary: Didn't see one.

content.detailedDescription: Wife let dogs out at 5am,not having glasses on saw a large bright lite above tree level.Blinking with out sound.Went up and stoped.Vanishing and went towards lake city.Could not see anymore due to trees and woods in the way.Very large bright lite flashing.No sound.She told me about it at 9am thought it may have been a medivac chopper because i am 3/4th mile from i-75 but she said there was no sound.Could not have been a chopper,plane ect.Chinese lanterns dont flash eather.Nor do flares.Unkown?????
content.summary: Bright blinking lite

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my aunt's house practicing skating in short distances up and down the street. it was cloudy out about 4:30 pm. i went back and forth in front of the house a few times. as i made my way past the house going up the street i heard a helicopter in the distance. i turned to make my way back down the street. the next thing i know i am a few feet beyond the house. it is now dark outside and very foggy. i felt very confused. in looking around i happened to look up and that's when i saw these lights flashing in sequence. flying over the houses. they appeared to be attaches to a circular shaped object, but i could not see the object. all i saw was the clouds above it. it made no sound and it was very low. i was terrified, i skated as fast as i could toward  the house. as i do so, i saw searchlights in the clouds just beyond the rooftop. as soon as i got in the door my aunt asked me where i had been. i told her outside. she insisted that i was not. she said she walked up and down the street looking for me and i was not there. i looked at the clock above the television and noticed that it was 8:30. she was convinced that i was lying to her. i felt very confused, afraid, and alone because to this day i have no recollection of being elsewhere. i looked out of the window to see if i could get a good glimpse at what the object was and it was gone. ever since then i have had a strange symbol on my left leg that burns from time to time. and i recieve odd telepathic messages that i do not understand.
content.summary: I was trying to skate outside of my aunt's house. i was looking up at the clouds and it was light out. next thing i knew it was dark, i saw the lights, i ran into my aunts house. she asked where i had been, i said outside, she insisted that i was not.

content.detailedDescription:
One morning whilst outside i noticed a star shape con/chem trail .
as i found this intresting i took photos on my mobile device. later that day i showed my partner and we noticed a ufo on one of the pictures. whatever it was it must have been fast moving as the ufo wasnt on any of the other photos taken. only thing i can think of is it maybe a satalite/missile??? 
i
content.summary: Ufo and contrail

content.detailedDescription: I saw three of these events over the last approx. 3 years. this is my first observation. late evening, perhaps fall early winter of 2012. walking back towards the house from my backyard i noticed an extremely large bright flashing light in the sky. it was at an elevation of about 70 degrees overhead in front of me moving in a straight line directly away from me towards the sse over my house. there was a scattered altocumulus to stratocumulous broken cloud layer cover due to a fair weather front that was moving though. the rest of the sky was clear between the clouds. it was cool, around 50 degrees. i was taken by surprise of this obeservation and at first thought it was military traffic heading to mcguire afb because there was a shaddow of something associated with the extremely bright strobe light effect coming from this object. the intense white flashing strobe light was the approx. size of a quarter at arms length when it pulsed. the object passed over top a cloud, and the constant cycle pulse of light like that of an intense slowly flashing on and off strobe reflected through the cloud as it passed over and iluminated it. that is something i have never seen before. after 15 seconds i lost sight of the object. it continued along the same path and faded from view like a commercial airliner. no sound, no change in direction, no change in color, just an intense off, on, off, on one half second pulse like a light switch with perfect frequency in a white extremely bright intense color light. since that time i observed 2 other sightings of the same object. in the second event it was about on the same course and heading and elevation and intitial point of observation. dark black sky, weather was fair. sky was unlimited. this was around six months later. i am unsure of the exact time and date. in this observation the strobe flashed on and off in an extemely bright white light on a regular half second interval along the same course and heading in the same direction over top my house as the previous sighting mentioned. i observed it for about 15 seconds as it grew dimmer and moved away, gradually dissapearing. third sighting was identical, except for the fact there was a pinpoint of light remaining after the strobe light flashed. huge sized flash of bright white, then back to a pinpoint of white light. i followed both the pinpoint and strobe until it flew outside of visual range.
content.summary: Intense very large bright  white "strobe light"  that passed over top cloud deck illuminating same from overtop.

content.detailedDescription:
We were 3 in vehicle, 2 adults 1 child. i asked  my sister in law, who lives in rome. ( i don't) if that was a normal light formation. she asked her daughter, who was sleepy and, answered no.
we both thought it wired. she was driving, therefore got a limited view.
i asked here if there was an airport there or electrical posts that could give off such a distinct light.
she said no. i emmidiately texted my husband to say thet he would love this wierdness.
as we took the off-ramp the lights moved and merged together to then disappere.
it was just like on tv. the four light swirld about and melted together to then extinguish.
content.summary: We were 3 in vehicle, 2 adults 1 child. i asked sister in law, who lives in rome,

content.detailedDescription:
I had woken up in the night and felt cold. i was cold because my covers were down by my feet. my feet were under the covers but the covers were piled or rolled into a pile over my feet. this has been the third morning that i have awaken with the covers kicked off sometime in the night. as i focus to look at the roll of covers i see something round and glistening at the wall about where the door knob would be. then i realize that the round thing is an eye and it is glistening because it is moving as it looks from side to side. i feel vulnerable so i attempt to reach for the covers but nothing is moving. i'm getting a little angry so i strain to lift my head off of the pillow. as i start to move my head up just an inch or two i notice that the eye belongs to a face. this is when i really notice the eyes glistening and moving. big like horse eyes or something, dark and shiny. i see this face and upper torso still standing against the wall staring at me. i think that the being is wearing something very dark blue or its skin is dark blue, it could be very hairy or its clothes are dimpled like it is wearing a padded suit. i have now managed to lift my shoulders from the bed and for just a second i believe that i see the whole being still standing there against the wall. it is at this point that something like a hand smacks me on the forehead and shoves my head back into the pillow. that is all that i remember from the incident.

i must have gone out like a light because i have no realization of what had just occurred until that night after my shower and getting ready for bed. i am fine until i turn off my light switch and then go full bore into a serious panic attack. i snap the light on and diligently search every crack and crevis, i frantically look under the bed and in the closet for something that is not supposed to be there. it is then that i recall what had happened the night/morning before.

i had this happen to me when i was just 17, and a senior in high school. because of what happened that night i cannot sleep alone without a night light or some other light source. i turn 44 this year.
content.summary: Woke up one night before school to a nonhuman being in the room.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 12:30am on thursday, may 1 i was watching tv when my daughter came hurriedly down the stairs saying "dad, you've got to come see this, hurry up". we went outside in the front yard and looking toward the south i could see three red orb-like lights flashing on and off in sync with each other. the lights were in an almost straight horizontal line. it would take about 1 to 2 seconds to cycle through the three lights, then about a 2 second pause and repeat. the synchronous timing of the lights made me think they were all attached to one object as opposed to being 3 separate objects. i couldn't see the object itself. it was moving slowly from east to west approximately 1/4 to 1/2 of a mile from us and i estimate about 75 to 100 feet off the ground. i lost view of it when it went behind a house across the street. my daughter and i got in the truck and drove toward where we last saw it but it was nowhere in sight.

my daughter told me when she first saw it from her upstairs window, the lights were in a triangular formation.

my first reaction when i saw it was to try to think of what it could be. all i could come up with in my mind was things it couldn't be. it was flying too slow to be an aircraft and the configuration of the lights were wrong. there was absolutely no sound so i knew it wasn't an aircraft or helicopters. i spent 23 years in the navy, some of it working around jets and helicopters so i am familiar with them and what they look like and sound like. this was like nothing i had ever seen before.
content.summary: 3 red orb-like lights blinking on and off. object travelling slowly east to west

content.detailedDescription: At around 9:10 to 9:15pm i had returned home from giving a friend a ride home from an appointment...I had parked my vehicle as i usually do and upon exiting i look in a westerly direction and caught the site of what appeared to be a large diamond shaped formation of 4 redish/pink colored lights in the sky, traveling a north to south direction...I soon saw a single redish/pink light following behind the formation...I know this was something i'd never seen before and was a bit amazed at what i was seeing...It was a large formation travelling smoothly, without any noise i could hear and no blinking lights...I soon noticed two more lights trailing some distance behind the formation, and in a v shape formation with one trailing behind a bit and to the left of the other light...I recall wishing that someone else might be outside to witness this with me and also thought of going inside to get my camera...I decided to remain outside to witness and keep the objects insight...They soon flew into the sight of some trees, who's leaves had not yet bloomed...I could tell that they would soon come back into clear sight and past these trees in a short time...I stayed watching and waiting for them to get back into clear view...I then noticed that i could not see all of them and only one had cleared the trees, the others were gone...I then watched as the lone object soon began to fade quickly and disappear...There was some whispy type high clouds, but i checked to make sure i could see the stars in the general area, which i could...So i don't believe they became obscured by any clouds...I truely don't know where they went...The whole formation of objects, and or lights, flew in a steady rate of speed, nothing spectacular and no great change in direction...I felt a bit amazed by this sighting and i know i've never seen anything like this before...It was a bit scary because i could not give an explaination of what it was i saw...I know i've never seen that many planes flying in such a formation of that size...There was no noise at all, there was no flashing aviation lights on any of the seven obiects...For decades, i've looked for satellites just after sunset on summer nights and this wasn't even close...Nor was this a meteor breaking up, flew too slow and in this formation of seven objects...I don't know what i was witness to, all i know it was nothing that i've ever seen before and a bit scary just by not knowing...I wish i had a witness or video, i don't...I know what i saw, just not what it was i saw...That i'd like to know and if anyone else in the area had also witnessed this...
content.summary: Large diamind shape formation with one trailing and a distance behind two more in the western sky. travelled north to south direction.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a walk at "parc des champs de bataille" and saw this bright starlike light moving slowly (hovering like) then it changed direction and zipped in a instant and no more light could be seen after that.First ufo i saw in my life. kinda weird.
content.summary: Saw a bright starlike light moving slowly (hovering like) then zipped in a instant and no more light

content.detailedDescription:
I was with a group that was visiting new orleans. we were waiting near the caf�� du monde beigne restaurant across  jackson square for the bus to take us back to our hotel. i happened to look up and saw two or more pinkish or reddish lights. they seemed to hover, then meandered around, then they disappeared. i asked a fellow traveler with the group what he thought they might be. he apparently jokingly said, "maybe they're ufos".
i wondered if perhaps they were flares. but i had never seen flares act in that manner. even with my doubts, i took a video (the video is of very poor quality. i turned the camera on it's side and the lights are on the left part of the video). in the intervening months, i was watching shows on the science channel and history channel. one in particular mentioned orbs seen at a swamp in louisiana. i decided to google ufos over new orleans. and i was surprised to discover videos on youtube, first showing sightings on october 24 and 25 of 2013. then i saw one from the same night as my sighting, october 20 about an hour and a half before mine (mine was about 9:30). i felt i wanted to corroborate especially the october 20,2013 sighting.
content.summary: I saw pinkish reddish lights overhead that meandered around then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: While on the beach at orange beach al at about 8:05pm cdt,i observed a white light come on at about 45 degrees above the horizon to the south towards mobile, al and over the gulf. what caught my attention was when the first light went out, another appeared in the same basic area, then a third then a fourth in no particular formation. they did not blink like a plane's lights but stayed on then off.  the lights appeared to remain stationary then all disappeared after less than 30 seconds after appearing. i watched for a few minutes to see if they would return but saw nothing more.
content.summary: Observed a stationary white light over gulf of mexico,then 3 more appeared near it went off and on then all disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Lights flash all night same area in sky,just lights hovering not moving any where,,,san jose over san cruz mountains,looking towards saratoga, ca
content.summary: Rotating bright colored lghts hovering in distant horizon every night sametime,same area in sky

content.detailedDescription: 3 ufos were flying over while i was on the phone. last moments at my old house. i've seen so many ufos in my life. most in the states but some in romania and one in cape town i feel like they know when a person is going to spot them beforehand. i've been with friends on many accounts but this one with the video was by myself
content.summary: 3 ufos were flying over while i was on the phone.

content.detailedDescription:
I and a friend had stopped at craggy gardens visitor's center on the blue ridge parkway on saturday, may 3rd at about 3:20.  we were looking towards the ne taking photos of the mountains when we noticed a very, very bright object/light hovering just above the mountain range in the distance.  the light appeared at about 3:30.  the day was sunny, bright with few clouds.  there were about 20 people there as well and we were all looking at the light discussing what it could be.  a few cars even stopped on the road and asked what "that bright light is?"

i was using my friend's kodak digital 10 megapixel camera and immediately zoomed in on the object.  i could not see any details except it looked round and was extremely bright.  i have included a photo of the object.  i had to resize the original photo to post it on this site but would be willing to send the original 10 megapixel photo along with the others i took.  i took several photographs at different zoom settings to make sure i had the surrounding area for reference.  the light lasted about 10 to 20 minutes and then slowly faded away, never moving from it's original spot.  the photos i took show that the light never moved from it's original position.  no other effects were noticed by any of the witnesses that i know of.  i have sharpened the photo and increased the contrast but otherwise i have not retouched the photo in any way and still have the original if needed.  i did try and zoom up close to the light but the camera could not focus on the object/light.  i don't know if an out of focus image of the object/light is of any interest or help, but i have saved it as well.  another photo of the object zoomed in seems to show it changed shape from round to another shape, but i can't be sure.  i have included that photo as well.
content.summary: Small brightly glowing light appeared just above mountains in distance during a clear, sunny day.

content.detailedDescription: reaparecen misteriosas orbitaciones(ovni/orb) de dobles puntos lenticulares /abril del 2014 desde argentina , el desplazamiento anormal , es chequeado y verificado en las listas satelitales, pero no hubo coincidencia . el fen��meno es orbital, y hace 3 a��os , se ha tornado , caprichosamente recurrente , en una zona celeste que cubre sobre la capital de argentina (buenos aires ) en la mayor��a de los casos datados y registrados  desde aqu�� , siempre con arrumbamiento visible norte y n /oeste ( detalle extra��o ).  26-4-2014 19:23  doble ovni /orbe sobre argentina , uno de los primeros de este a��o 2014, los misteriosos orbitales de  doble n��cleo luminoso , que muchas veces a simple vista , no son discernibles" mas que como un solo punto sumamente radiante de luz en el cielo, este caso mostr�� " magnitudes - 1 / -2" iguales y mayores que "sirio" las estrella mas brillante del firmamento . en la tarea de cotejar y verificar el caso ,  se tomaron mas recaudos en cuenta , los listados satelitales de diferentes magnitudes lum��nicas , aun siendo estas de menor magnitud , a veces( este mismo caso ) se verifica y compara " a posterior tambi��n " el mismo evento( antes y despues ) y hasta tres , si fuese necesario" este caso puntual llevo por ejemplo , a prestar seria atenci��n al  satelite, adeos ii quedando muy sugestivo en los listados de esta tarde , verificado en seguimiento a trav��s de los pasos sucesivos de d��as posteriores, que no mostraron nada extraordinario o anormal, como ser conformado por un doble n��cleo . ustedes pueden hallar por mis bancos de video, mas casos similares ,siempre tomando la precauci��n tambi��n de lograr el registro lo mas pr��ximo al cenit , para contrarrestar aberraciones atmosf��ricas en la imagen etc , el equipo empleado fue trv 310 ( video x fire ware , no date cam), en modo infrarrojo . saludo a todos los investigadores .
content.summary: Double ufo lenticular ? over buenos aires
content.locationName: Buenos Aires Norte y Oest, Santo Domingo

content.detailedDescription:
Subject was sitting outside in the morning and looked up in the sky and saw a glowing red medicine ball shape 25 feet across zig zagging very,very fast across the sky following the mountain range, making no sound 
it was above 800 feet and came over me and went north toward camp david

another time subject saw the red glowing orb it was in the evening after midnight, it was clear with bank of clouds over the mountain range
the orb was moving towards camp david again,  subject got a glimpse of the craft it was silverish in color and had a  black dome on top
after subject saw it, it took off along the mountain ridge line glowing red, moving towards camp david
subject had no doubt it was not a plane, but a ufo

the last sighting of the red glowing orb it was moving toward camp david and then subject  heard helicopters chasing it

subject was confused at first, but now looks for it
content.summary: In the early morning hours subject saw a red orb following mountain range

content.detailedDescription:
Subject was hanging out at store at night with friends
 the night was clear
subject was at his car and just turned around and saw a white glowing disk with dome on it slowly fly by at at 35% angle
subject knew it was a ufo at once
subject got a little fear come over him
subject watched it drift out of sight behind trees

he had heard reports of lights going over road previously, but thought nothing of it

day or two before, at the same spot at the store,he and his friends saw what they thought was a meteor or ufo buzz by very fast 
it was very bright and lite up the sky like early morning light
content.summary: White shimering disc with dome going by slowly

content.detailedDescription:
One morning whilst outside i noticed a star shape con/chem trail .
as i found this intresting i took photos on my mobile device. later that day i showed my partner and we noticed a ufo on one of the pictures. whatever it was it must have been fast moving as the ufo wasnt on any of the other photos taken. only thing i can think of is it maybe a satalite/missile??? 
i
content.summary: Ufo and contrail

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping woke up and noticed the moon was bright shining through the curtain of my rv  

i opened the shade to look at the moon then noticed it was half a moon then a light caught my attention and became real bright i thought it was a planet  and then disappeared faded out. 

my feelings was i can't believe what i just seen so i got dressed went outside and look at the sky in the area where i saw the bright object . 

i then noticed none of the stars around the area of the moon could be seen because the moon was so bright and so much light in the sky.
content.summary: Light appeared while i was looking at the moon got real bright then faded out
